briefdescription.para: Margin factor for error message.
Margin correction if the box is too skewed.

memberdef.argsstring: [epbcNR+1]

briefdescription.para: Strings corresponding to epbc enum values.
Set to true if warning has been printed.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ePBC)

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of dimensions that use pbc.

simplesect.para: the number of dimensions that use pbc, starting at X

The periodic boundary condition information structure

memberdef.name: check_box

briefdescription.para: Check the box for consistency.

simplesect.para: NULL if the box is supported by Gromacs. Otherwise returns a string with the problem. When ePBC=-1, the type of pbc is guessed from the box matrix.

memberdef.argsstring: (matrix box, const rvec vec, const rvec angleInDegrees)
memberdef.name: matrix_convert

briefdescription.para: Creates box matrix from edge lengths and angles.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ePBC, const matrix box)
memberdef.name: max_cutoff2

briefdescription.para: Compute the maximum cutoff for the box.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the square of the maximum cut-off allowed for the box, taking into account that the grid neighborsearch code and pbc_dx only check combinations of single box-vector shifts.
ePBC
The pbc identifier
box
The box matrix
the maximum cut-off.

memberdef.argsstring: (const matrix box)
memberdef.name: guess_ePBC

briefdescription.para: Guess PBC typr.

detaileddescription.para:
Guesses the type of periodic boundary conditions using the box
box
The box matrix
The pbc identifier

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fplog, int step, tensor box, int v, int d)
memberdef.name: correct_box_elem

briefdescription.para: Check if the box still obeys the restrictions, if not, correct it.

memberdef.argsstring: (FILE *fplog, int step, tensor box, t_graph *graph)
memberdef.name: correct_box

briefdescription.para: Corrects the box if necessary.

detaileddescription.para:
Checks for un-allowed box angles and corrects the box and the integer shift vectors in the graph (if graph!=NULL) if necessary.
fplog
File for debug output
step
The MD step number
box
The simulation cell
graph
Information about molecular connectivity
TRUE when the box was corrected.

memberdef.argsstring: (t_inputrec *ir)
memberdef.name: ndof_com

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of degrees of freedom in center of mass motion.

simplesect.para: the number of degrees of freedom of the center of mass

memberdef.argsstring: (t_pbc *pbc, int ePBC, const ivec dd_pbc, const matrix box)
memberdef.name: low_set_pbc

briefdescription.para: Do the real arithmetic for filling the pbc struct.

memberdef.argsstring: (t_pbc *pbc, int ePBC, const matrix box)
memberdef.name: set_pbc

briefdescription.para: Initiate the periodic boundary condition algorithms.

detaileddescription.para:
pbc_dx will not use pbc and return the normal difference vector when one or more of the diagonal elements of box are zero. When ePBC=-1, the type of pbc is guessed from the box matrix.
pbc
The pbc information structure
ePBC
The PBC identifier
box
The box tensor

memberdef.argsstring: (t_pbc *pbc, int ePBC, const ivec domdecCells, gmx_bool bSingleDir, const matrix box)
memberdef.name: set_pbc_dd

briefdescription.para: Initiate the periodic boundary condition algorithms.

detaileddescription.para:
As set_pbc, but additionally sets that correct distances can be obtained using (combinations of) single box-vector shifts. Should be used with pbc_dx_aiuc. If domdecCells!=NULL pbc is not used for directions with dd->nc[i]==1 with bSingleDir==TRUE or with dd->nc[i]<=2 with bSingleDir==FALSE. Note that when no PBC is required only pbc->ePBC is set, the rest of the struct will be invalid.
pbc
The pbc information structure
ePBC
The PBC identifier
domdecCells
3D integer vector describing the number of DD cells or nullptr if not using DD.
bSingleDir
TRUE if DD communicates only in one direction along dimensions
box
The box tensor
the pbc structure when pbc operations are required, NULL otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const t_pbc *pbc, const rvec x1, const rvec x2, rvec dx)
memberdef.name: pbc_dx

briefdescription.para: Compute distance with PBC.

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the correct distance vector from x2 to x1 and put it in dx. set_pbc must be called before ever calling this routine.

Note that for triclinic boxes that do not obey the GROMACS unit-cell restrictions, pbc_dx and pbc_dx_aiuc will not correct for PBC.
pbc
The pbc information structure
x1
Coordinates for particle 1
x2
Coordinates for particle 2
dx
Distance vector

memberdef.argsstring: (const t_pbc *pbc, const rvec x1, const rvec x2, rvec dx)
memberdef.name: pbc_dx_aiuc

briefdescription.para: Compute distance vector for simple PBC types.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculate the correct distance vector from x2 to x1 and put it in dx, This function can only be used when all atoms are in the rectangular or triclinic unit-cell. set_pbc_dd or set_pbc must be called before ever calling this routine.
pbc
The pbc information structure
x1
Coordinates for particle 1
x2
Coordinates for particle 2
dx
Distance vector
the ishift required to shift x1 at closest distance to x2; i.e. if 0<=ishift<SHIFTS then x1 - x2 + shift_vec[ishift] = dx (see calc_shifts below on how to obtain shift_vec)

memberdef.argsstring: (const t_pbc *pbc, const dvec x1, const dvec x2, dvec dx)
memberdef.name: pbc_dx_d

briefdescription.para: Compute distance vector in double precision.

memberdef.argsstring: (ivec xi, ivec xj, ivec box_size, real rlong2, int *shift, real *r2)
memberdef.name: image_rect

briefdescription.para: Compute the box image corresponding to input vectors.

memberdef.argsstring: (ivec xi, ivec xj, ivec box_size, real rlong2, int *shift, real *r2)
memberdef.name: image_cylindric

briefdescription.para: Compute distance vector when using cylindrical cutoff.

detaileddescription.para:
Calculate the distance between xi and xj for a rectangular box using a cylindric cutoff for long-range only. It is assumed that rlong2 is scaled the same way as the ivecs xi and xj.
xi
Box index
xj
Box index
box_size
Number of box grid cells
rlong2
Cutoff squared
shift
The shift code
r2
The distance (squared???)
TRUE when the distance is SMALLER than rlong2 (in X and Y dir)

memberdef.argsstring: (const matrix box, rvec shift_vec[])
memberdef.name: calc_shifts

briefdescription.para: Computes shift vectors.

detaileddescription.para:
This routine calculates ths shift vectors necessary to use the neighbor searching routine.
box
The simulation box
shift_vec
The shifting vectors

memberdef.argsstring: (int ecenter, const matrix box, rvec box_center)
memberdef.name: calc_box_center

briefdescription.para: Calculates the center of the box.

detaileddescription.para:
See the description for the enum ecenter above.
ecenter
Description of center type
box
The simulation box
box_center
The center of the box

memberdef.argsstring: (const matrix box, rvec img[])
memberdef.name: calc_triclinic_images

briefdescription.para: Calculates the NTRICIMG box images.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ecenter, const matrix box, rvec vert[])
memberdef.name: calc_compact_unitcell_vertices

briefdescription.para: Calculates the NCUCVERT vertices of a compact unitcell.
Compute unitcell edges.

simplesect.para: an array of unitcell edges of length NCUCEDGE*2, this is an index in vert[], which is calculated by calc_unitcell_vertices. The index consists of NCUCEDGE pairs of vertex indices. The index does not change, so it needs to be retrieved only once.

memberdef.argsstring: (int ePBC, const matrix box, int natoms, rvec x[])
memberdef.name: put_atoms_in_box

briefdescription.para: Put atoms inside the simulations box.

detaileddescription.para:
These routines puts ONE or ALL atoms in the box, not caring about charge groups! Also works for triclinic cells.
ePBC
The pbc type
box
The simulation box
natoms
The number of atoms
x
The coordinates of the atoms

memberdef.argsstring: (int ecenter, const matrix box, int natoms, rvec x[])
memberdef.name: put_atoms_in_triclinic_unitcell

briefdescription.para: Put atoms inside triclinic box.

detaileddescription.para:
This puts ALL atoms in the triclinic unit cell, centered around the box center as calculated by calc_box_center.
ecenter
The pbc center type
box
The simulation box
natoms
The number of atoms
x
The coordinates of the atoms

memberdef.argsstring: (int ePBC, int ecenter, const matrix box, int natoms, rvec x[])
memberdef.name: put_atoms_in_compact_unitcell

briefdescription.para: Put atoms inside the unitcell.

detaileddescription.para:
This puts ALL atoms at the closest distance for the center of the box as calculated by calc_box_center. When ePBC=-1, the type of pbc is guessed from the box matrix.
ePBC
The pbc type
ecenter
The pbc center type
box
The simulation box
natoms
The number of atoms
x
The coordinates of the atoms

briefdescription.para: Implements routines in pbc.h.

internal.para: Utility functions for handling periodic boundary conditions. Mainly used in analysis tools.
